name: Save Halloween: City of Witches
description: The servants of Lucifer stole the Stone of the Dead and opened the gates of the Hell! You are to fight with Lucifer and restore the Stone of the Dead before rising of the bloody moon! Otherwise, Lucifer will gain power over the world and the dark forces will remain forever in the world of the living.
minimum_requirements: OS: XP/Vista/7/8/10 Processor: 900Mhz Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: integrated DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: Integrated
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows xp,7,8,10 Processor: 900Mhz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: integrated DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: integrated

reviews.review_text: This is way too addictive to be just $5. The visuals are bright and colourful and animate very fluidly across the board. If you\'re into match three games then you kind of have to get this one.
